website_summaries.verdict: A good buy if you need a more affordable option that still holds a lot of material.
pros: Designed with a large main compartment and smaller compartments and pockets to help you stay organized
cons: Taller people commented that the size was too small for them

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I use this as my work bag and it holds a lot. I pack my lunch, two 24oz insulated water bottles, a 7oz thermos for espresso, a compact Bible, sometimes a small umbrella, and various things that I need to get through the day. So far it still looks new. There are no signs of wear. I'm so glad that I didn't have to spend over $100 for a quality work bag. I got the black one to keep things simple and professional. I would definitely buy this bag again.
customer_reviews.author: D. E.

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter who is entering elementary school. This bag is cute and much bigger than I expected. I measured it against her cousins jansport which I originally took the measurements from to base my purchase against and this bag is huge compared to it. Major drawback for me is that later down the line when she needs to actually take all her books to school she may get some difficulty in opening the bag wide as the elastics on the side prevents it from opening up like the jansport.
customer_reviews.author: kela

customer_reviews.title: This bag was great when I first got it but slowly it began ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag was great when I first got it but slowly it began to fall apart. I thought his was a quality name. The best part I have never put more that 10 pounds of stuff in it..... Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: medicpres

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a great backpack!
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a backpack my 13yo son loves. This thing has a ton of space in it, and the zippers seem more heavy duty than other backpacks. It also has a laptop slot in the middle of it, which is padded on the bottom for extra protection from drops. I have zero complaints thus far.
customer_reviews.author: ohjonny

customer_reviews.title: Well-made and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a serious backpack! Very well made, sturdy, zippers all work fine. We bought this for a 7-year old boy so it's pretty big for him, but that's certainly not the backpack's fault. I feel pretty confident it will last him longer than a year or two, so maybe he'll grow into it a little better. Definitely big enough for an adult. The neon green is bright and looks great. Has lots of pockets! - maybe too many; I keep losing things in there, lol. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: The Yellow House

customer_reviews.title: Back panel tends to bunch up during wear
customer_reviews.text: This backpack swallows up items endlessly, but even though I'm 4'10" it doesn't look big on me. It's lightweight and has ALMOST as much organization as I could want. After using it for a bit, I've discovered an annoying feature. The back panel tends to bunch up vertically when the bag is held up by the shoulder straps—AKA when you're wearing it. This creates a lump on your back that I don't find uncomfortable (it's sort of like a lumbar cushion on a chair) but I do find psychologically annoying.
customer_reviews.author: éclair

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I searched really hard trying to find a good sturdy backpack for my son to use at school. I read reviews and examined pictures. He went thru 3 backpacks last year. I really wanted a different experience this year. School started just barely over a month ago. The main zipper separated today. So Not Happy
customer_reviews.author: KD Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: The Fatboy is my boy!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had another print in this bag from grade 3-the end of 7th. I finally agreed to allow a new backpack as she just couldn't kill it. There were two small pin holes (which I repaired with some button hole sticking over the opening) and we are going to sell that one. Meanwhile, I plan for her to graduate with this new black one!
customer_reviews.author: MomtoPeach&Popcorn

customer_reviews.title: Love High Sierra backpacks!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our 6th grade daughter for school. She loves it! The dark color hides dirt well. She used the last one for 3 years!! We have 4 kids and the High Sierra backpacks worked very well for their elementary and junior high years. They used each of theirs daily for 2+ years before we had zipper issues or just wanted a new one. These also carry their school laptops well with padded slots. Once they hit high school/college we moved to heavier duty brand bags due to the larger books and devices.
customer_reviews.author: Jokoboco

customer_reviews.title: Great Book Bag
customer_reviews.text: very nice book bag very comfortable on the shoulders in the back. My daughter uses this. she's in middle school and has a ton of books and folders and is really huge and accommodates everything that she has to carry with her from class to class very spacious you could fit full size binders and even a 10 inch tablet inside with no problem deadly we recommend if you're looking for a spacious book bag.
customer_reviews.author: P. Velez

customer_reviews.title: Great Backpack!
customer_reviews.text: Ok I have had this backpack for three months and I can say that this is definitely my favorite I use it for my college books and laptop I would really recommend this item it is very durable and versatile the side pocket holds my yeti tumbler very well overall would repurchase again in the future
customer_reviews.author: Blanca Duran

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, spacious, durable!
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the photo, high quality, and has LOTS of expandable space. Bought for an average-sized 10-year-old, 5th grade boy and fits well. Very happy with purchase. Update: Lasted all year with a vivacious 5th grader. Using it again this year. It says not to machine wash (it didn’t look dirty but wanted to give it a rinse.) Quickly washed in a bucket with a touch of Castile soap and dried outside. Looks clean and brand new.
customer_reviews.author: ljdbs

customer_reviews.title: Probably not what it used to be, but still good.
customer_reviews.text: I had a book bag like this a long time ago. I used it from 5 grade until I graduated highschool. That book bag was the single most durable item I’ve ever owned in my life. I was not kind to it, but it’s still intact and still usable. Comparing that old one to this, you can see how some corners were cut as many other things these days are. It feels cheaper. Many details are gone that are in the old one. It’s certainly holding up so far though. I hope it lasts as long as the old one.
customer_reviews.author: Julian Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: missing a feature
customer_reviews.text: I bought a new one for traveling, but I found my old one and I will donate this to a local school. Overall, there were nice features and a large container holder since many are metal reusable, but my old one had a waistband that helped with the balance of the backpack and also secured it to my body so it wouldn't be taken so easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Sargent

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, holds up to heavy loads
customer_reviews.text: Bought this backpack before school started and one semester in, it's still holding up well, despite my son filling it up with every heavy book he has and lugging it around everywhere. I was nervous at first at how well it would hold up to the severe abuse I knew my son would inflict, but so far, I'm impressed with the workmanship and sturdniess of this bag. I would absolutely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: MEL

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. Arrived early
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Arrived early, looks exactly like it does in the photo. And is bigger than what I expected it to be. It fits all of my 5 binders and can hold extreme weight. I wouldn't overfill it too much, but it can surely hold all of my text books. I'm a high school student, and I usually have to have two backpacks a year, which is such a waste of money. This backpack will definitely last me through more than a year of school, extremely durable. Exactly what I was looking for. Overall a perfect purchase 😊
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Barnish

customer_reviews.title: Large capacity and pretty pattern
customer_reviews.text: This is a great backpack. As a college student, I've found that it has the capacity to carry 2 3-ring binders and a textbook for daily use for classes, or my relatively large laptop plus a binder and textbook. The extra pockets are really useful for keeping things separated and organized. You can adjust the straps, as well as the side straps to hold the backpack in tight. I also like the pattern because it's unique and bright. The only thing I don't like about this backpack is that the material along the edges of the straps is a little rough, and always rubs against my clothing. It has caused pilling on some of my sweaters from the rubbing.
customer_reviews.author: KReview

customer_reviews.title: Best backpack I have ever used.
customer_reviews.text: I am thoroughly impressed with this backpack. It fits everything and then some. I am able to carry 2 big binders a laptop a thermos and tons more in this thing. It feels flimsy but it has held up to the beating I have put it through. Tons of pockets which is a huge plus. I was scared reading some of the reviews but I definitely do NOT regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jessica johnston

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel and daily use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I have one like it that I purchased in 2012 for a trip to Italy. It has had daily use and is still in great shape. My son needed a carry on for a 20 month trip and so I parted with my back pack I am getting ready for another trip and although I have other back packs, this is the perfect for travel. The old pack has been washed several times and still looks great. . It has also been used to carry books and a lap top.
customer_reviews.author: LBS

customer_reviews.title: Roomy organization
customer_reviews.text: My 10-year-old son loves all the pockets for holding his loose writing pencils, pens, etc., and was excited to discover the tablet pocket. It is roomy enough to hold his notebooks, binder, sweatshirt, gym clothes, etc. Durable material, seems to be well-stitched; overall great product.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne P

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Our last High Sierra backpack lasted K-3rd grade and besides one zipper pull coming off it was still going strong! I love the quality of this brand and how well it holds up. I finally let my son get a new backpack for 4th grade just to enjoy having something new. His older one would probably have gotten him through all of elementary school if we had needed it to! I will stick to this brand for sure.
customer_reviews.author: K. E. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Fat with features
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd Fat Boy I have purchased. It is sturdy, holds a lot, has many pockets and is comfortable to wear. I just wish it had a chest compression strap.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Volume might be mislabeled as 39L
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in 2015 and has held up well traveling once a year but I was in search of a 45L travel bag and noticed they seem quite larger compared to this 39L backpack. So I googled the conversion and found L= in3 / 61.024 and if I'm doing the math correctly using their demensions, this is a 29L backpack! 19.5x13x7= 1774.5/61.024= 29.078L
customer_reviews.author: echo

customer_reviews.title: It was a good size
customer_reviews.text: I liked it but my 14 year old wouldn't use it so I returned it. She is a freshman and has to carry a lot of books, etc. and I thought this would be the solution. She thought she would be like she had a big lump on her back. She will just have to figure out how to carry all her high school "stuff".
customer_reviews.author: brb

customer_reviews.title: Worth the wait, I know it will last years not months.
customer_reviews.text: Best backpack period, if you want the most out of you money this is your bag. After buying my son three backpacks I wanted to go with something that was tough, if your a parent you know what I mean. We went through three character backpacks, those character backpacks are cute but they don't last very long.
customer_reviews.author: Rapheal

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't keep its form much as it's pretty unstructured, and it's not uncomfortable but at the ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't keep its form much as it's pretty unstructured, and it's not uncomfortable but at the same time not super comfortable over long periods. Seems sturdy though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack. Love the funky design
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack. Love the funky design. The straps on the side are helpful when daughter is lugging it around the house with the top unzipped, or as she is rushing out of the house stuffing things in. Those straps provide extra stability and strength to the bag. We needed a larger bag to fit multiple 3-ring binders and this one works.
customer_reviews.author: MTByrd

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product lasts for years
customer_reviews.text: Best traveling back pack ever bought. I've had one for years still looks brand new and have used for many trips, air, train, boat, bus. Bought this one for my husband for our next trip for him to use.
customer_reviews.author: TAMMY FORWOOD

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack. I'm a grandmother and 5'2" tall. Most packs are too large and I avoided "kids" crazy prints. This is very stylish and held everything I needed as an airline carry on for our vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the best...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how else to describe this backpack other than awkward. Once it's filled with stuff (binders, notebooks, etc) the fat boy design quickly become enormous. If you're looking for a bulky, not streamlined design go for it. Once full this backpack won't sit up straight and falls over on the ground. I will say it appears well made but there are definitely better options out there.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan H

customer_reviews.title: Roomy & Durable
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bag. This is my daughters second High Sierra bag. The are very durable, and this one is very roomy. I got this bag because her school is under construction, and she does not have a locker for the first & second quarters. It is sufficient in size, quality, and we are pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lady

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. It is sturdy, rain resistant, with plenty of roomy sections, most with a variety of smaller pockets for phone, pens, water bottle, umbrella. My life and my back are sooo relieved that I bought this. Plus, the pattern I chose is pretty. This gets the job done!
customer_reviews.author: KK Creates

customer_reviews.title: nice strong colors and space
customer_reviews.text: The seller was super awesome! Item came exactly as described. Orange is a true orange. Berry is a purplish berry. I love all the compartments. The back has a nice cushion on it. I wish the sleeve for the laptop had some padding. It is just a fabric pocket inside the backpack. I am sure the protection will be okay, but I would have preferred some padding.
customer_reviews.author: L. M. Maggio

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality bag
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality bag. Bought this for my daughter for school and it last the entire year still all intact md looking new and my daughter was not very gentle with it. Would definately purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Honey

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Compare To Swerve Backpack
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack to replace my High Sierra Swerve backpack. The comparisons on amazon said this bag had more space the the swerve, however I have found that is can hardly fit all of my college textbooks. Additionally after having this bag for just two months, the zipper broke on the main pocket and the small pouch on the left strap completely ripped off. I had my swerve backpack for 3 years and this one has lasted only 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Sister of 3

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: High quality, excellent price. I have a happy kiddo. I replaced the really cheap and damaged first off-brand backpack I bought in the fall with this one. This one will LAST a lot longer and appears to be comfortable and spacious.
customer_reviews.author: Jjpm

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack was a gift for a young man. He thought it was perfect. He especially likes the size and all of the convenient zippered storage sections.
customer_reviews.author: notyeta10kwriter

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and Well Made For Daily Heavy Use
customer_reviews.text: I waited to review this until my middle schooler had carried it over 1/2 the school year. This is so well made and withstands daily heavy carrying use. It holds lots of books and large binders. It has lots of compartments for smaller things. This has been a superb backpack!
customer_reviews.author: Livin4Him

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack for school!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect backpack for my son who is in junior high. It fits a LOT of stuff and he says that it is really comfortable. He rides his bike to school with this on every day and he thinks it's great. The colors a nice a bright and it has plenty of pockets for all the little stuff as well. The straps are easy to adjust and they hold their settings without needing to be readjusted. I highly recommend this one!
customer_reviews.author: Juan H

customer_reviews.title: Feels cheap
customer_reviews.text: The material is very thin with a plastic liner. It just feels cheap. I was very disappointed and will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great backpack, you can fit many things into here! I have a huge laptop case, three textbooks, multiple notebooks, over a hundred pens and pencils, binders and folders and many other things stuffed in the backpack and i still have room for other things! The only thing that I would change of this product is if I could put a side pocket for a water bottle to go in. Other than that, a great product! I had an old one of these that i got in 6th great, and it lasted until i was in my sophomore year, although, i did take good care of it.
customer_reviews.author: Vinyl Boi

customer_reviews.title: The quality is shockingly bad!
customer_reviews.text: The worst bag ever ! I wanted them to last , got them for my 10 year old son for Xmas and he use it on the first day of school and he came back with the bag literally torn apart ! Zippers gave way, the whole bag was literally wide open when I picked him from school. The should strap tore he couldn’t even pick the bag up ! A total waste of money :-( literally used for half a day !
customer_reviews.author: Saif H.

customer_reviews.title: ... my long train commutes to work and it is fantastic! It has several pockets to fit everything I ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this backpack to use for my long train commutes to work and it is fantastic! It has several pockets to fit everything I need in. It is also deep enough to fit my large and thick lunch box in! Great backpack!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Pertusati

customer_reviews.title: My ten year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter picked this as her backpack for her 5th grade year. It's a great size and is really good quality! The pattern is bright and cheerful. She absolutely loves it and was really excited to show it off at school, haha!
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: Great back pack for school!
customer_reviews.text: My high schooler has been using these backpacks for years. He loves them! Plenty of space and many pockets to keep items organized.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Jollie

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof and durable
customer_reviews.text: This is the second High Sierra backpack I've gotten, the first one lasted 4 or 5 years and is still in acceptable condition but this version is much nicer. Would buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: dicar

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this bag everyday for about 3 years now. I carry it to work with me and on vacations. It has been all around the Caribbean! Well made. Comfortable to wear (and I am a huge fat guy)!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy R Smith

customer_reviews.title: Has lasted the entire school year!
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack! I bought it for my 5th grade son. He would wear out the bottom's of other bags every few months. This bag has held up amazingly well! He will have gone through an entire school year with the same bag! It may even be used again next year! He likes all the pockets and organizers the best. Will buy this brand of bag from now on!
customer_reviews.author: MByrd

customer_reviews.title: Nice for middle school
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son who started middle school. Love all of the compartments. Only reason I gave it four star is the fact that the material is a little thinner than I hoped and zippers are not that smooth. Lots of compartments and lots of space! Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany C

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Great Value! This design was on sale, purchased as a gift for teenager who will use it for several years. It looks like it will hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: KC Baltimore

customer_reviews.title: My third one, indestructible
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, long lasting, lots of zippers, useful layout, surprisingly roomy. Very well priced.
customer_reviews.author: Egerio

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I use it to lug around all of my books and papers from school and its held up pretty well. The 4 pockets allow me to have all my notes in one and snacks in another. I really like the pocket that is on one of the straps as i can just put my pencil in it and not worry
customer_reviews.author: ThePotatoShepard

customer_reviews.title: Best backpack!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say this has been the best back pack I've bought! My daughter carries all her books and folders every day from class to class with her and it has held up all school year and that is saying something! I normally buy at least 2-3 a year but thankfully I found this fantastic backpack and will definitely buy another if needed. Also this pack has lots of pockets and places to put things. So far the fabric hasn't torn the traps have held up really well . Over all very happy with this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Great bookbag. Lots of pockets, great weight distribution, and awesome quality. It gives nice support along the shoulders and back. Nothing negative to say about it.
customer_reviews.author: Ra-rl

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and LARGE backpack
customer_reviews.text: Nice backpack. My daughter likes it and it seems to hold an insane amount of things. She has 1 huge 4" binder and lots of textbooks and notebooks and somehow they all fit in this backpack. My daughter's back in a whole different story...Don't know how teens are expected to lug around so much weight on their backs!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my son’s school needs! He was having a hard time finding a backpack that would fit his massive binder and still have room for anything else. This backpack fits everything and doesn’t look like it’s massive and going to topple him over. Great product for such a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: sturdy & pretty
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase for any student. I got this to replace an inexpensive bookbag I purchased in the beginning of the school year; which did not even last the first half of the school year. This bag has tons of compartments only thing missing is a water bottle pocket. It is very sturdy and you can carry a lot with this backpack. I already owned another one of these in black we have been using it for over 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Alexia S.

customer_reviews.title: Great School Bag
customer_reviews.text: Very roomy, sturdy and cool looking. Daughter loves it for school.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Rowan

customer_reviews.title: High Sienna rocks!
customer_reviews.text: I've always had good luck with High Sierra. Bought this for my 6th grader, 2 months in and going strong!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Fox

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag nice price
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag for the price. Gonna see how long it last because Im rough on bags. Appears durable.
customer_reviews.author: R Forte

customer_reviews.title: Would buy this again. Would refer it to anyone who's looking for a strong backpack
customer_reviews.text: This is a strong backpack. Holds the load of books for my grandkids for school. Lots of space
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Backpack
customer_reviews.text: I like that this is a shorter backpack since I am short but that does not mean it's short on features and room. I have used this backpack for hiking and plan on using this as my carry-on for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied mom of a 5th grader!
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdy book bag! My Fifth grader loves the design and all the secret pockets (as she calls them) As a mother I love that it is made strong enough and big enough to hold all her books and school supplies! I highly recommend this brand!
customer_reviews.author: Tracie Hutcherson-Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Two years later and still going strong
customer_reviews.text: This is a great buy. The space provided is great and the product is really durable . Purchased for school for a then 8 year old boy. We also used it for traveling and it has held up really well. I eould buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Aletheia

customer_reviews.title: Cute bag
customer_reviews.text: Great quality bag and bigger than expected. Hoping to get a few years out of this one!
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna Morse

customer_reviews.title: Large capacity backpack
customer_reviews.text: Highschooler uses for books and binders. Crams it full. Has held up great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very rugged and spacious
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this backpack for my son who likes to carry lots of books around. The special compartment for tablets is great. Very well made and resistant.
customer_reviews.author: HH

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: Large enough for a 10x 14.5 inch laptop, love the extra zippers a compartments. Durable, water repellent, takes a beating. I bought a replacement after 10 years of abuse.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: ... for my son for next school year and he love it. love the color and the backpack can ...
customer_reviews.text: brought this for my son for next school year and he love it . love the color and the backpack can hold lots of his books from school . this is my second bag . we love high sierra backpack
customer_reviews.author: Erika vv

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a 1st grade boy, as yes it is very durable. Has plenty of room and pockets
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Schnetzler

customer_reviews.title: Really nice backpack. Good quality and nice styling
customer_reviews.text: Really nice backpack. Good quality and nice styling. Other good features like multiple pockets (one large, one med, one small), adjustable limit straps to keep bag from falling wide open, shock absorbing shoulder straps with a little fabric "shock absorber" (I don't know how much this helps, but I like the concept), etc.
customer_reviews.author: AKC

customer_reviews.title: Love these backpacks
customer_reviews.text: Keep buying and buying... Love these backpacks, buy every year for the kids to go back to school. Still good at the end, and we donate their old ones.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Strap buckle defective
customer_reviews.text: This product lasted 5 months due to a break in a strap buckle. The back pack was used by a middle school student carrying on average 10 note books/binders. It has a nice capacity but disposable quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sofi

customer_reviews.title: It’s going to last more than one school year!
customer_reviews.text: My son is super tough on back packs. This has held up better any thing we have ever had! We’re so excited to use it again next year! Wonderful bag!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Shevchenko

customer_reviews.title: So much better than buying multiple cheap ones
customer_reviews.text: My second Fatboy backpack purchase, the first lasted almost three school years! So much better than buying multiple cheap ones.
customer_reviews.author: rgregones

customer_reviews.title: It's gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I wish it had more of a natural flat base to that it can stand on it's own. My bag is front heavy resulting in it falling forward. Plenty of room for carrying various types of items.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This product is good for looks and usage. It is able to hold an entire cat inside without tearing at all. I tested it with 3 different cats and the product was still fine. Make sure to check the size to know whether it fits your needs. Definitely worth buying!
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Sly

customer_reviews.title: Exceedy my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations! I bought this for my 9 y/o daughter and picked this because of the color purple and I’m not sure about the design as I could not see it very clear in the picture when I zoom this in. When the bag came, my daughter and I loved it! The tiny designs are ice cream, donuts, etc. My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Chie Moody

customer_reviews.title: Amazing backpack. My son uses it for school
customer_reviews.text: Amazing backpack. My son uses it for school, and it works great with a huge load of stuff. Would recommend to anyone, especially middle schoolers! :)
customer_reviews.author: carmen

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Product
customer_reviews.text: The bag itself has a lot of space and compartments but the handle on the top ripped off on the second day of use. The bag wasn't overstuffed or very heavy. It contained three water bottles (16.9 oz each) and a rolled up sweats and a tee. Very cheap quality for $40.
customer_reviews.author: Brazuka

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good my son like it but I think it more for a 4,5,6 grader. My son is in 8 and I find it is too small for all his binders. But over good
customer_reviews.author: yesenia

customer_reviews.title: High quality.  No more cheap backpacks for our kids!
customer_reviews.text: We lobe high Sierra. Our daughter is going on her third year with her backpack. We hope our son’s backpack lasts at least a whole school year!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Haviland

customer_reviews.title: Ready for schools hard day gym dance and all
customer_reviews.text: This back pack has the happiest color and durable looking and feel my daughter is happy and I’m looking forward to an entire school year without it falling apart!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: Product came exactly as pictured and if it lasts the remainder of this school year and next, I'll upgrade to 5 stars. It's got a good price point, lots of pockets and seems much sturdier than my daughter's last backpack, an "Angry Birds" pack that I had to sew back together so many times that after 5 months of use, there was nothing left to sew.
customer_reviews.author: Vanderwoman

customer_reviews.title: Best backpack!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing backpack, looots of room for a vet school student who works and exercises, i can divide each compartment to each daily task, beautiful vibrant colors, sturdy material, i just love it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Beatrice

customer_reviews.title: Is light weight and feels good on the back
customer_reviews.text: This bag has quite a lot of room in the main compartment. Is light weight and feels good on the back. It doesn't have laptop sleeve, just so you know. I did not purchase for that, but just so everyone knows.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of storage!
customer_reviews.text: Great size, lots of pocket space. Haven’t ‘used’ it yet, but all of my son’s things fit inside easily. Nice looking too!
customer_reviews.author: sara tobias

customer_reviews.title: Well made sturdy backpack
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack for my son to use in middle school. It is well made and has been holding up nicely! I love the design as well!
customer_reviews.author: MULEFAM

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Was bought as a gift for my nephew. He loves it. It is sturdy and nicely made and nothing can beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bria

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I like how I can put many things in the small can pocket on it. I wish it had an insert to keep it flat on bottom
customer_reviews.author: Jerret

customer_reviews.title: Durable and stylish for 11yr old
customer_reviews.text: My 11yr old loves this backpack she has so much room for all her school book and supplies. I love the durable way it’s made. I have paid more for backpacks that just fall apart I am positive my child will get lots of use from this backpack!
customer_reviews.author: T. Engel

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Price was a factor. High Sierra is a great brand and can be pricey. This was not overpriced
customer_reviews.author: Deborah w

customer_reviews.title: Great little backpack
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little backpack. Just the right size. Not big not small. Good for a travel stow backpack with essentials.
customer_reviews.author: BAM166

customer_reviews.title: Great product I would use it
customer_reviews.text: Its great product, I use this product for work and everyday . It’s fits perfect
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: It is surviving a 13 year old boys use for school books. Need I say more?!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Drinnon

customer_reviews.title: GREAT purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Love this backpack! Rugged and Sturdy. Held up great for my sons trip to the United Kingdom both as his carry on and as his backpack while there, he's currently using it as his high school backpack and it's holding up great to the weight of everything carried in it.
customer_reviews.author: stangchic

customer_reviews.title: roomy backpack, good build...
customer_reviews.text: loved this backpack , super roomy, fits a lot of stuff and still comfy to carry. bought for my nephew who just started high school and he's super happy with it so far. bought on sale as a today's deal just before school started, price was great and quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Bluebird of Randomness

customer_reviews.title: Good quality backpack, but the height seems little smaller
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our son for his 8th grade, Happy with the product quality and very happy with the price. The height seems little less than some of the other backpacks we used, but I guess it can fit lot of books etc for school use. The speed of shipping can improve. Will update after few months of use how good this lasts!
customer_reviews.author: Vijay Ravula

customer_reviews.title: my daughter loves it... it was cheap,,, and it carries here crap around for school.....
customer_reviews.text: my daughter loves it... it was cheap,,, and it carries here crap around for school.....
customer_reviews.author: tony m.

customer_reviews.title: I’d buy again
customer_reviews.text: What a GREAT pack! I love it and the price is unbeatable. Came in lightning speed and inside of awesome packaging too! Thank you very much
customer_reviews.author: Cypress

product_meta.title: High Sierra Fatboy Backpack
product_meta.description: High Sierra designs feature-rich, versatile adventure lifestyle gear for adventurers everywhere. We've committed ourselves to creating durable, affordable product with distinctive details, delivering the freedom to go anywhere.
feature_bullets: LARGE, MULTIPLE COMPARTMENT DESIGN: you can keep your tablet in a designated tablet sleeve; keep your things organized with a premium organizer compartment; multiple zippered pockets hold essential items in place; with a convenient key fob for your keys

FRONT ZIPPERED ACCESSORY POCKET with USB PORT: High Sierra Fatboy backpack comes with a front zippered accessory pocket to store your smaller accessories; includes a USB port and internal cord pouch; conveniently charge up your phone while on the go

DURABLE, RIPSTOP FABRIC: this High Sierra backpack is made with 600D and Mini-hexagon Duralite fabric giving the bag exceptional tear strength while keeping it lightweight; also has a water resistant coating that protects it from moisture

ADJUSTABLE, PADDED SHOULDER STRAPS; High Sierra's Fatboy backpack is designed to give you comfort and ease of carrying; with adjustable, padded shoulder straps that disburse weight more evenly on your shoulders

COOL and VIBRANT DESIGN CHOICES: the High Sierra Fatboy backpack is a small, pear-shaped backpack available in several different vibrant color combinations; with its small size and a variety of color choices, it makes a great lunch backpack for kids
